content: Hello,This is an introductory inject. You have 10 minutes to read this and familiarize yourselves with the platform. Injects like this represent events in the simulated world of this exercise. You can interact with the world using the tool CLI in the right part of your screen. To use a tool, select one from the panel on the very right. This will print the tools prefix into the console. Every prefix must be followed by an argument, depending on the tool youre using. Hover over the tool to see its usage.The example usage of browser, for instance, would be VISIT some.page.com. There is an exception to this in the email tool which takes two arguments, the recipients address, and the email content (EMAIL TO aaa@bbb.com Hello, this is the content of the email.).Rules:    - Make sure that you always have your team number selected in the top left corner. Switching to other teams is prohibited and will be monitored.    - Only have this page open on one of the computers in your group.    - Cooperate only with your teammates.    - Do not try to intentionally "break" the exercise, you may damage the experience for the entire group.    - Be patient and do not spam commands into the CLI, the content you see only refreshes every 5 seconds.Guidelines    - Use Firefox browser for optimal experience    - Discuss every action you take with your teammates.    - You do not have to successfully complete the exercise, in order to get a credit. You do, however, have to show dedication and actively participate in the exercise. Cheating or tampering with the exercise will only damage yours and others experience.    - There is not a strict "end goal" in this exercise. Even after you believe you have finished it, think about what else could be done and keep exploring.    - If you are struggling with a tool, read its tooltip by hovering over it. If there are further issues, contact the instructors.    - You can only send an email to one address at the time, make sure to read the EMAIL tooltip for correct usage.    - The tool panel in the right section of your screen is scrollable (you may not see all the tools at once if you have smaller resolution).    - The real length of the exercise is 5 minutes shorter than the timer shows (a reminder inject will be sent). Use those last 5 minutes to ***save the html*** of this page, you will need it in later exercises. This page will no longer be accessible once the exercise concludes.In case you think you are having trouble with the technical part of the exercise, ask the instructors in person, or write a simulated email to instructors@help.com.Once you read this, test your understanding of the CLI and tools by sending a test email with some content to the instructors@help.com address. Instructors
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com Trying to send an email from 6.
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Team 6, welcome in the tabletop game.
Greetings,please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.Thanks,FREEMAIL provider
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=abuse@freemail.ex

Dear CSIRT-U,Im forwarding yet another phishing mail.Best regards,--Dr. DoeFaculty of ScienceOn 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exYour Account will soon be suspendedYour allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account."doe@mail.uni.ex"Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex<="" account="">Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emailsThis Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"Sincerelymail.uni.ex support team.
DNS https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/
WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR https://nice-project.uni.ex
cloud@uni.ex
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt

To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.exSubject: Suspicious content of our project homepageGreetings,could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/Thanks a lot!Jane Taylorproject managerNice project

EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Good afternoon, we would like to request temporary suspension of website hosted at https://nice-project.uni.ex since it appears to be a phishing website under the address https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/. Our findings are based on several user reports.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
SEARCH MAILS RECEIVED FROM it_department@mail.ex
1 mail sent to kathy@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex
Just a reminter, the email address for the general data protection officer is dpo@mail.uni.ex
Hello,we just power off a virtual machine hosting this website.Best,Cloud provider

EMAIL TO dpo@mail.uni.ex Good afternoon Ms. Hoffmann. We would like to report a leakage of sensitive user information on a phitshing site https://nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt which had been just recently hacked and is still being investigated for causes. This entails full name, birthday and email addresses of around 30 people. The file had been taken down. The file with full list can be deliver to you later as an attachmenth
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Dear CSIRT-U,thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.Sincerely,Kim HoffmanData Protection Officer
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Good afternoon, we are en-route to investigate it. Please stand by, do not attempt to fix the issue for now.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Oh no, we need to have our website up as soon as possible!Regards,Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Good afternoon, thank you for help. Can we ask if there were was any unusual traffic outside of HTTP/HTTPS on said virtual machine?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Do you have any backups of the website because that we could use? Can we ask why is it important to keep the website running?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
EMAIL TO doe@mail.uni.ex Good afternoon, thank you for your report. We are on our way to resolve it
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Sorry, we have no clue about our network traffic.cloud@uni.ex
WHICH IPS https://nice-project.uni.e
Invalid request, the tool does not exist
WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex
No IPs visited this website
Sorry, we are administration staff. No, idea about backups. Ask IT support help.
WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/
WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt
No IPs visited this website

Website unreachable.
Dear CSIRT-U,Im glad we have such great security team!Dr. Doe
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Can we ask for the email to the IT support? Its important
Email was sent, wait for reply.

Website unreachable.
Most probably Mr. Harris, harris@mail.uni.ex
VISIT https://mail.ex/
Website unreachable.

EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Good afternoon, we are contacting about the website (https://nice-project.uni.ex/) which is supposedly under your responsiblity by Jane Taylor. The website had been supposedly hacked by a third party and now hosts a phishing website under the https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/ address. We were forced to temporarily shut down the VM because the website hosts sensitive data of around 30 university students/employees. Do you have any backups of the website that you can use? Can you check if there was any suspicious traffic going into the VM hosting the website?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Hello, Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.I have some old backups from June, 2020.Regards,Harris
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com We have a question, does the block from/to tool block for email addresses block all unrelated email addresses originating from the same IP as well, or not?
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex/
No IPs visited this website
NO, it blocks just a single email address.

EMAIL TO abuse@mail.ex Good afternoon, weve received reports of abuse originating from it_department@mail.ex and we would like to verify whether the email belongs to a legitimate part of the domain or its controlled by a user.
Email address was not found

EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Please check the state of the VM. We reiterate that we had to shutdown the VM and is possibly victim of an attack. From the previous conversation with Ms. Taylor she mentioned that the website is critical for operation, could you details us why?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
VISIT freemail.ex
Website unreachable.
VISIT https://mail.ex/
Website unreachable.

EMAIL TO peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex Good afternoon, from recent network traffic youve visited a known phishing website (https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/) and we recommend changing your password to the account if you had interacted with the site further and submitted any data into it.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

Greetings,Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.Should I reinstall my computer???Please help me.Best regards,Kathy Lee
MAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Can you give us a contact of the person who had tasked with deployment of the VM?
Invalid request, the tool does not exist
EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Can you give us a contact of the person who had tasked with deployment of the VM?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
This guy already left the university.
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Youve left out the answer to a question why is the project important for the website to be kept up running.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Greetings, there is no need to panic, this had been issued as a recommendation and we ask you to change login details to your university account, you dont have to reinstall your computer.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Greetings, ok, can we ask who had created the relevant VM?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
OK, I will do my best to change the password I use to access all my account. Is it a valid approach?Best regards,Kathy
EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Yes, thats the valid approach. Thank you for understanding :)
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Yes, Mr. Bond created this VM. He is now working at unknown address.
EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Can we ask for the name of the person at least?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
